div.p:
Online user 1:
I never paid attention to the ads, but, seeing all those ads together made me really wanna have a drink.

Online user 2:
Yeah I wish some of that stuff happened in my life. They make it look pretty good!

Online user 3:
Imagine what the ads would look like if it was the shy introverts who made more high-risk choices than the rest of us.
Online user 4: I don't know, I guess you'd see a lot more ads for people drinking at book clubs or something.
